details.title: Technology challenges for the Square Kilometer Array
details.abstract: The SKA offers an opportunity for new approaches to the design, development, and construction of radio astronomical instrumentation, building on industry expertise in large-scale manufacturing of high-technology devices. The SKA Organization includes an Industry Participation Manager, and the SKA web site includes an invitation for industry collaboration, a list of opportunities for industry, the management model, and contact information: See http://www.skatelescope.org/pages/page_industrial.htm.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
